hotels.title: Award-Winning Five-Star Vietnam Luxury on the Perfume River with Room Upgrade & Daily Breakfast
hotels.description: Discover the beauty of Vietnam’s former imperial capital with a stay at the boutique Azerai La Residence, Hue. Fit for royalty, this award-winning five-star hotel boasts elegant, luxuriously spacious public areas and a palatial exterior. Feast on creative Asian fusion at La Residence Café, practise your backstroke in the saltwater swimming pool and indulge in a pampering spa treatment at the wellness centre. Spectacular facilities and exceptional service have earned the hotel a place in Tripadvisor's Travellers' Choice, Best of the Best 2021 ranking, placing it in the top 1% worldwide on the review site. Nestled on the banks of the fabled Perfume River, Azerai La Residence, Hue is the perfect launchpad to the sites and wonders of this World Heritage-listed city, including Thien Mu Pagoda and To Mieu Temple Complex. Hue is the tranquil, culture-rich alternative to some of Vietnam’s more bustling cities, its serenity owing largely to the picturesque Perfume River which weaves throughout the city. **Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights):** - Wake up to delicious **daily breakfast** at La Residence Café - Enjoy absolute comfort with a guaranteed **room upgrade** - Celebrate your escape with a **welcome cocktail** on arrival (for stays of 2+ nights) - Get a taste for the region with one **two-course set dinner** (for stays of 3+ nights) - Relax with one **60-minute full-body massage** each (for stays of 5+ nights) **Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2021** Top Hotels for Romance - Vietnam **Colonial Suite Upgrade:** Discover your home-away-from-home in this gloriously expansive suite, boasting a large bathroom with bathtub, plush king bed and generous panoramic veranda with Perfume River views.
